title: Hi, I am Alexander Lu
description: I am an EECS undergrad at UC - Berkeley pursuing a minor in Applied Mathematics interested in AI systems. I am a BAIR affiliated researcher working on LLM interpretability. Additionally, I'm also inventing AI solutions towards detecting epilepsy at the UCSF Weill Neuroscience Center. I am open to research and internship opportunities in AI and SWE!
extras: Beyond coding, I enjoy exploring design patterns, contributing to open-source, and sharing my knowledge through blogs and tutorials!
